mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID ,ORG_CD ,INSU_NUM ,IS_PERSON ,PRIZE_NUM ,PRIZE_NAME ,IS_PRIMARY ,PRIZE_ADDR ,OBJECT_CODE ,PRIZE_CODE ,API_TRAN_DAY ,API_TRAN_ID ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DT ,CHG_USER_ID ,CHG_DT FROM INSU_MI_BASE_PP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND INSU_NUM = #{insuNum} AND IS_PERSON = #{isPerson} AND PRIZE_NUM = #{prizeNum}
